summary: Completed comprehensive testing of one-page architecture transformation. All major features working correctly including navigation, map functionality, contact form, and route redirects.

design_issues.issue: 'Made with Emergent' badge visible in bottom-right corner

passed_tests: One-page architecture with all sections (accueil, masterplan, contact) on single page
Smooth scrolling navigation with anchor links working perfectly
Masterplan section has light/prestigious theme (white gradient background)
Map lazy loading when section comes into view
Interactive map with parcelle click opening detail sidebar
Map filter functionality (disponible, option, vendu, all)
Contact form submission with success toast and field clearing
Contact information display (email, phone, address, hours)
CTA buttons in hero section navigate to correct sections
Mobile responsiveness with working mobile menu
Language switching between French and English
Footer does NOT contain 'Powered by Emergent' text (correct)
One Green Dev branding properly displayed in footer
